name: Select products from a category and subcategory and add them to the shopping cart.
scenarioId: add-products-to-a-shopping-cart:Select products from a category and subcategory and add them to the shopping cart.
methodName: Select products from a category and subcategory and add them to the shopping cart.

testSteps.description: 1: Select products from a category and subcategory and add them to the shopping cart. ({Category=Dormitorio, Subcategory=Cabeceros, Email=jardilac91@gmail.com})

children.description: Given the user is in the Exito shopping page.
User opens the Exito home page
When the user select a category "Dormitorio" and a subcategory "Cabeceros".
User clicks on Menu button
User clicks on Category Dormitorio
User clicks on SubCategory Cabeceros
And adds five random products with an aleatory quantity between 1-10 products.
User select products
User clicks on [By.xpath: //*[@id='gallery-layout-container']/div[16]/section/a/article/div[2]/div[2]/div/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div/div]

User clicks on Add product button
User clicks on Continue with shopping button
User clicks on Shopping Cart button
And add the email "jardilac91@gmail.com" to complete the purchase.
User enters 'jardilac91@gmail.com' into Email input
User clicks on Confirm email input
Then the information of the products in the shopping cart have to be the same as the selected products.
User validate shopping cart

Then The products name has to be:  should be ([Cabecero Industrial Caramelo Para Cama De 140 X 190, Cabecero Para Cama Doble Dublin Café, Cabecero Para Cama Doble Dublin Negro, Cabecero Tapizado Base Cama Queen Rombos Plateado, Cabecero Tapizado Tela Base Cama Doble Rombos Marfil])
Then The products quantity has to be:  should be ([1, 5, 5, 7, 8])
Then The products price has to be:  should be ([296900, 975000, 1115000, 1365000, 2639200])
Then The total purchased has to be:  should be (6391100)

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the user is in the Exito shopping page.
When the user select a category "<Category>" and a subcategory "<Subcategory>".
And adds five random products with an aleatory quantity between 1-10 products.
And add the email "<Email>" to complete the purchase.
Then the information of the products in the shopping cart have to be the same as the selected products.
